note_info: The company bears the shipping costs only in the event that we send a wrong product. Otherwise, the customer bears the shipping costs when making a replacement or refund.
policy_info:
The consumer has the right to exchange or return the product or commodity that he has purchased within 14 days if it is defective, not in conformity with the specifications, or a product that is different from the required.
Underwear, towels and masks are not allowed to be exchanged or returned.
Products purchased through offers cannot be exchanged or returned except in cases of manufacturing defects.
title: Return Policy
